{"step_by_step_thinking": "Increased depth in the posterior palatal seal area of a denture is expected to have an effect on the retention of the denture. The posterior palatal seal is an important component of the denture that helps in achieving optimum retention. A deeper posterior palatal seal area provides a better topographical mimicry of the intaglio surface of the denture base to the underlying mucosa, which improves retention. Therefore, the correct answer is C. Increased retention.", "answer_choice": "C"}
